sub_rules.content: A method is marked with the @Override annotation whenever it is legal. This includes a class method overriding a superclass method, a class method implementing an interface method, and an interface method respecifying a superinterface method.
sub_rules.formalization: before OverrideMethod must be constrained to be @Override

sub_rules.content: Exception: @Override may be omitted when the parent method is @Deprecated.
sub_rules.formalization: before (OverrideMethod with @Deprecated) could be constrained to be @Override
